title: Luoyang Stadium
text: The Luoyang Sports Centre Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Luoyang">Luoyang</a>, <a href="China">China</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. The stadium holds 39,888 spectators. It opened in 2008.
